name: cineverse
description: CineVerse - A modern movie streaming platform built with MERN stack by Fahad, Arpit, and Atharva. Features include movie browsing, trailers, personalized watchlists, and user authentication.

scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && nodemon index.js" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../client && npm install

author: Fahad, Arpit, Atharva
